name: Pearson Exotronics Military Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the rarer military hulls commonly produced by Pearson Exotronics Corporation system fleets.

name: Pearson Exotronics Core Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the basic ships and armaments employed by the Pearson Exotronics navy.

name: Pearson Exotronics Weapon Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce more complex armaments employed by the Pearson Exotronics navy.
